question: Your neighbours have recently written to you to complain about the noise from your house/ flat.Write a letter to your neighbours. In your letterexplain the reasons for the noiseapologisedescribe what action you will take
text: I am writing this letter to apologise for the noise coming from my apartment. After receiving your letter, I became aware that I am creating some inconvenience. I am sorry for all the trouble that I caused you and all the other neighbours.

The reason for the noise is the plumbing work required to clear the drain system which is important as my kitchen and toilet pipes were clogged since last week. I hired a plumber to do the necessary repairs and he promised me to finish the job within 3 hours however, he found that he needs more time because of the old sewage system.

The required work is almost finished as the plumber assured me that he will need only a few hours to complete the job. To avoid causing disturbance I will schedule his next visit during your working hours between 9 am to 5 pm.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
